track.strDescriptionEN:
"One Kiss" is a song by Scottish record producer Calvin Harris and English singer Dua Lipa. Written by Lipa, Jessie Reyez and its producer Harris, it was released by Columbia Records and Sony Music on 6 April 2018. It reached number one on the UK Singles Chart on 20 April 2018, a week after debuting at number three. The song would eventually top the charts for eight consecutive weeks, becoming the longest-running number one by a lead female artist in the UK this decade, and the second longest-running number one of the century by a female artist behind only Rihanna's "Umbrella". "One Kiss" will be included on the complete edition of Lipa’s eponymous debut studio album.

The accompanying music video, directed by Emil Nava, premiered exclusively on Apple Music on 1 May 2018, and then on YouTube a day later. The video features Lipa dancing in front of a number of bright and tropical backdrops. It has been described as "trippy" due to its visible green-screen effects, fancy visuals, and retro costume choice. Harris also makes an appearance as a waiter in the video. Its official music video also received nominations for Best Dance and Song of Summer at the MTV Video Music Awards 2018.
